Welcome to \"Learn It\" App. Master complex topics using spaced repetition. You cannot take your sweet time to understand a topic. The world won\'t wait for you. The only way to keep up in such a world is to memorise the content. Your brain will constantly try to find patterns and make sense of what you remembered. After several revisions you will eventually understand it. This App will help you revise efficiently using spaced repetition technique which is scientifically tested.

Young man, in mathematics, you don‚Äôt understand things, you just get used to them.\n\nSome people think this is a wrong statement but this is a fact. Humans don\'t see recursion and iteration in their daily lives. These kind of topics will only make sense when you get used to them.

This permission allows the app to post notifications. Without this, you will not see the alarm screen when an alarm rings, nor be able to dismiss it later from the notification.
Schedule Alarms ‚è∞
Android versions S and above need a permission to schedule exact alarms. Without this, the app will not be able to schedule any alarms.
Ignore Battery Optimizations üîã

The Android system, by default, sets all user installed apps to be optimized to save battery. While this is OK for many apps, this app is an alarm clock app, and often faces trouble if set to optimize battery. With this enabled, the Android system can kill the app at any time and/or cancel the alarms it has set, which will be detrimental to the working of the app. We recommend you to whitelist this app from battery optimizations.
Change \"Do Not Disturb\" settings üôÖüèª

The app allows you to set different ring volumes for each alarm. Before ringing the alarm, the app tries to change the volume of the system alarm stream to the volume you have set (and restores it to what it was initially). To change the volume, the permission to change Do Not Disturb settings is needed in Android Nougat and above. If not granted, the app will simply not set the volume before ringing the alarm.
